Dear Jim:
No, we*re not doing any additional monitoring studies on New York. If
Suchy*s material is published, and I would hope that once again it would
not run to more than a few pages, I would guess that we would handle it
as we did his last thesis excerpt, out of regular publication budget.
It was nice to see you but I*m sorry that it was for so short a time.
